com.cmput301w17t07.moody

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w17t07.moody.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User model class for the Moody application. Stores the information for a user of the Moody application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username)
        Constructor for the user object. Takes in a username, and stores it as both "displayUsername" that will be displayed in the application, and as a "username", which is a lowercase version used to help with elastic search of the database
        Parameters:
        username - The user's selected username

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String username,
            android.media.Image profilePicture)
        Constructor for the user object. Takes in a username, and stores it as both "displayUsername" that will be displayed in the application, and as a "username", which is a lowercase version used to help with elastic search of the database. This constructor also takes in a profile picture that the user selects.
        Parameters:
        username - The user's selected username
        profilePicture - The user's selected profile picture
